subject: RE: [junit] GUI unit testing
msgSnippet: He is writing setters in the GUI to send data and commands to the production code.  The production code will use setters so the GUI can display changed data.
messageBody:
He is writing setters in the GUI to send data and commands to the
production code. The production code will use setters so the GUI can
display changed data.

Joel Altman
Shuttle Training Aircraft

-----Original Message-----
From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Ilja Preuss
Sent: Friday, August 18, 2006 3:17 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] GUI unit testing

Altman, Joel G. (JSC-CC)[LM] schrieb:
> This developer is producing simulator controls: drop-down boxes, PBIs,
> radio buttons, etc.

Is he just placing them inside a layout, or is he also responsible for
wiring them to the production code?

Curious, Ilja
